attributes.additional_details:
Whether the EU wants to trade with us or not is their decision and our government should not keep stalling and just make things happen. I am fed up with their we must get the best deal for Britain answer all the time. If we want to break free of the dithering of the EU and our own government and the people who voted remain we must all act NOW and I call upon every person who believe as I do that we should invoke article 50 and start the process of leaving the EU and regain our pride,our independents and our future as soon as possible.
This petition will be delivered to:
Prime Minister of the United Kingdom and Leader of the Conservative Party
Theresa May MP
attributes.background: Article 50 must be invoked now. We have had a democratic vote and we voted to leave the EU. I want us to start negotiations now so we know we are not being hoodwinked by the powers that be into having our vote ignored.

rejection.details: The open petition similar to yours is https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133618
